TEXT: If you don't use potions this turn, you will have to discard potions at the start of your next turn, when you obtain the Brewed potion. You won't be able to use the surplus potion for its effect!
LABEL: Brewing too many potions

TEXT: If you enjoyed playing as The Sage, please consider promoting it on Steam Workshop. We would be glad if you dropped a like or left a comment!
LABEL: Steam Workshop

TEXT: If you don't block an attack this turn, you will stop Flying. This means that all attacks in the same round after losing Flight deal double the displayed damage!
LABEL: Knocked Down
